courseDescription:
In this age of social media, personal branding is more important than ever. It is the best way to show your uniqueness and specialities and establish yourself as an expert in your field. Personal branding separates you from the rest of those trying to make it in their field. It encompasses all of how you promote yourself and create a public persona. In this course, Sorin Constantin, your tutor, will teach you how to develop your personal brand with a strong statement that sets out the value you want to provide. Creating a personal brand can expand your social network, which helps you secure a better job, sell more products and increase promising opportunities in your career. However, you don't build a brand overnight. It takes planning and commitment to see results. Explore how to keep your brand image strong and consistent and what it takes for your brand to develop worldwide.

Next, we will explain the purpose of personal branding and teach you how to design your story, craft your messages and define your audience through your website(s) and blogs. We will introduce you to the strategies, tactics and online tools such as WordPress, Mailchimp and more that will help you build your brand. You will learn how colours, typography and themes reflect a cohesive brand image and attract loyal clients and followers through real-life examples. We demonstrate the process of integrating social networking into your personal branding. Learn how to kick start your social media presence, communicate your engaging message and offer value to a group of potential clients on Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, YouTube and so on. Explore the benefits of webinars and social media ad campaigns in building a credible brand image.

With more people building brands, you need to put yourself out there to get noticed. Personal branding benefits high-volume exposure and takes a clean stance on business objectives, values and goals. Having a professional and well-known brand can improve your chances of getting more clients. The more customers know about you, the more likely they will purchase from you. You can also use your brand-building skills to influence other people's brands and earn money. If you are an expert or a businessman struggling with starting your personal brand and lacking the know-how to build an authoritative personal brand, this is the course you should take. So why wait? Register today and start positioning yourself in the digital world.
